casebody.data:
No. 08-1438. Harvey Leroy Sossamon, III, Petitioner v. Texas, et al. 560 U.S. 923, 130 S. Ct. 3319,

176 L. Ed. 2d 1218,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 4266. May 24, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted limited to the following question: “Whether an individual may sue a State or state official in his official capacity for damages for violations of the Religious Land Use and Institutionalized Persons Act, 42 U.S.C. § 2000cc et seq. (2000 ed.).”

Same case below, 560 F.3d 316.
